quote: We've got everything we need right here, and everything we need is enough.
author: Jack Johnson

quote: Nation needs soldiers, politics needs civilians.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Life begins where needs end.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: What I want is to be needed. What I need is to be indispensable to somebody. Who I need is somebody that will eat up all my free time, my ego, my attention. Somebody addicted to me. A mutual addiction.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Choke

quote: We need learn what we need to learn, know what we need to know, and do what we need to do.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: All I have is all I need and all I need is all I have in this moment.
author: Byron Katie

quote: No need, no, need. Life is already too short to find it.
author: Jessica Day George,  Princess of the Midnight Ball

quote: What is given to you is what is needed; what you want, requires giving up what you don't need.
author: George Alexiou

quote: Trying is always enough.
author: Patricia Briggs,  Dragon Bones

quote: Love is enough.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: I need you to be happy. I need one of us to be happy.
author: Holly Black,  Red Glove

quote: The need for love and intimacy is a fundamental human need, as primal as the need for food, water, and air.
author: Dean Ornish

quote: Someone needs to fight,someone needs to sacrifice, someone needs to inspire, someone needs to be a hero.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Sometimes what we want isn't what we need.
author: Gena Showalter,  The Darkest Night

quote: As you grow ready for it, somewhere or other you will find what is needful for you in a book.
author: George MacDonald,  The Marquis of Lossie

quote: You have everything you need for complete peace and total happiness right now.
author: Wayne W. Dyer

quote: Don’t ask what the world needs. Ask what makes you come alive, and go do it. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.
author: Howard Thurman

quote: You will receive everything you need when you stop asking for what you do not need
author: Nisargadatta Maharaj

quote: What you seek is seeking you.
author: Rumi

quote: Enough is never enough.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Only you could be more important than what I wanted...what I needed. What I want and what I need is to be with you, and I know I'll never be strong enough to leave again.
author: Stephenie Meyer,  New Moon

quote: When you can't get what you want, get what you need
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: I needed him like I'd never needed anyone.
author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Crescendo

quote: Love? I need a lot of love."Of course you do. Everyone does. It's funny that we never say it. It's OK to scream, 'I'm starving' in public if you are hungry; it's OK to make a fuss and say, 'I'm so sleepy', if you are tired; but somehow we cannot say, 'I need some more love.' Why can't we say it? It's just as basic a need.
author: Chetan Bhagat,  One Night at the Call Center

quote: I think that everybody needs four things in life. Everybody needs something to do regardless of age. Everybody needs someone to love. Everybody needs something to hope for, and, of course, everybody needs someone to believe in.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: How we need another soul to cling to, another body to keep us warm. To rest and trust; to give your soul in confidence: I need this, I need someone to pour myself into.
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: You aren't alive if you aren't in need.
author: Henry Cloud,  Safe People: How to Find Relationships That Are Good for You and Avoid Those That Aren't

quote: We come into relationships often very much identified with our needs. I need this, I need security, I need refuge, I need friendship. And all of relationships are symbiotic in that sense. We come together because we fulfill each others' needs at some level or other.
author: Ram Dass

quote: Not necessity, not desire - no, the love of power is the demon of men. Let them have everything - health, food, a place to live, entertainment - they are and remain unhappy and low-spirited: for the demon waits and waits and will be satisfied.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: If you want me, you’d better hurry. Act now, supplies are limited.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: I want to love you without clutching, appreciate you without judging, join you without invading, invite you without demanding, leave you without guilt, criticize you without blaming, and help you without insulting. If I can have the same from you, then we can truly meet and enrich each other.
author: Virginia Satir

quote: We make our purpose.
author: Carl Sagan,  The Varieties of Scientific Experience: A Personal View of the Search for God

quote: I'm done. I don't need anything more out of life. I have you, and that's enough.
author: Alessandra Torre

quote: Man needs, for his happiness, not only the enjoyment of this or that, but hope and enterprise and change.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: If you have a garden and a library, you have everything you need.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: And my God will supply all your needs according to His riches in glory in Christ Jesus.
author: Anonymous,  The Holy Bible: New American Standard Version [NASB]

quote: I need you because I know I deserve you but let me fall in love with you one last time before I let go. So I can remember the beautiful imperfection that rattled my bones.
author: Robert M. Drake

quote: That's what this country needs -- more books!
author: Christopher Morley

quote: If you need me I’ll be napping in the supplies closet. The most important part of an attack is the planning.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Enough [10w] Enough's the only thing most people can't get enough of.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: great books are the ones we need
author: Charles Bukowski,  The Last Night of the Earth Poems

quote: We do need a system, and we do need you and your 'Bertos, and sometimes we need Sam to just come along and kick some ass. - Quinn
author: Michael Grant,  Lies

quote: Knowing is not enough, we must apply. Willing is not enough, we must do.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: The more you know, the less you need.
author: Yvon Chouinard,  Let My People Go Surfing: The Education of a Reluctant Businessman

quote: The people need to know that the people need to know. And I’m just the man to let them know that they need to know. However, what they need to know, I do not know.
author: Jarod Kintz,  Seriously delirious, but not at all serious

quote: You have succeeded in life when all you really WANT is only what you really NEED.
author: Vernon Howard

quote: You have succeeded in life when all you really want is only what you really need.
author: Vernon Howard
